metadata.name: Aqua Libra
metadata.description:
A study of liquid and the cosmos, created using liquid within the cosmos. For most of the formation of this piece the canvas was covered in pools of liquid. A great deal of paint was flicked, dribbled and blown onto the wet surface, creating beautiful rivers of light and shade. 

I love space and I love water. Sometimes they come together in spectacular ways. For example more than 12 billion light-years away is a quasar (a very active, feeding black hole) which has a reservoir od water surrounding it which is 140 trillion times all the water in our world's oceans. Numbers so large that they almost become meaningless. Imagine the wonder of it though.

This large painting has been collected as a physical piece. However I present to you the wonder that is ...

Aqua Libra
